# Click Events Click events are triggered when users click or tap on interactive components like buttons. ## Syntax `component [event-handler]` ## Example `view .html [ button "Click Me" [ print "Button clicked!" ] ]` ## Components Supporting Click Events - button - key_button - checkbox (when used as toggle) - tab ## Event Object Click events don't provide additional event data. ## See Also - [Event Overview](/wiki/core/events/event-overview/) - Introduction to events - [Input Events](/wiki/core/events/input-events/) - Input event handling
